title: Filibuster Rule, MI Rep. Hayley Stevens
itunes:title: Filibuster Rule, MI Rep. Hayley Stevens
description:
Guests: Rick Davis, Bloomberg contributor, and former campaign manager for John McCain's 2008 presidential campaign, Tyler Deaton, Republican strategist, fundraiser and President of Allegiance Strategies, and Rep. Hayley Stevens, a Democrat representing Michigan's 11th district.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
